ai-ya9.3:1.1_0: They give up the unskillful and develop the skillful,
ai-ya9.3:2.1_0: Or they give up the unskillful and develop the skillful,
ai-ya9.3:3.1_0: He who does not give up the unskillful and develop the skillful,
ai-ya9.3:4.1_0: Or they don’t give up the unskillful and develop the skillful, they don’t grow disillusioned with it.
ai-ya9.3:5.1_0: Development, development, and making the meditation subject.
ai-ya9.3:6.1_0: The Book of the Dhamma is finished.
